WP_.index_9_: Will update from current version {0} to latest version {1}, continue?
WP_.index_10_: Are you sure to delete this plugin?
WP_.index_11_: Are you sure to delete this theme?
WP_.index_12_: At least 1 theme is active, activate another theme before disable it
WP_.index_23_: You can securely access wp-admin through this page

Add_.Title_: Add site - Support batch site building
Add_.Tips_: Versions 5.6.0+ automatically turn on automatic version updates
Add_.CacheNginx_: Enable caching, currently only supports nginx
Add_.import_5_: Subdirectory, blank in the root directory

Migrate_.content_: About to migrate sites, are you sure you want to continue

Tips_.1_: After the migration you will be able to manage your wordpress sites in WP Toolkit, but you will not be able to continue to manage your wordpress sites in [Website]!
Tips_.2_: There are no wordpress that can be migrated from the Website
Tips_.4_: * Unable to restore wordpress website to [Website] after migration

Integrity_.index_1_: If you suspect that this site is infected by malware, check the integrity of WordPress corefiles by verifying them against their reference checksums from wordpress.org.
Integrity_.index_4_: This will reinstall the WordPress core files without losing site content. It is recommended that you back up your website before reinstalling.
Integrity_.index_5_: If checksums fail to match, you can quickly reinstall WordPress core files without affecting your site content.

RedirectionTips_.0_: Protect your website by changing the login URL and preventing access to the wp-login.php page and the wp-admin directory to non-connected people.
RedirectionTips_.1_: Redirect URL when someone tries to access the wp-login.php page and the wp-admin directory while not logged in.

clone_.index_9_: Empty clone path means clone in the root directory

Transition_.index_6_: More features are under development, looking forward to your feedback

Sets_.index_9_: Are you sure you want to remove this set?
Sets_.index_12_: A set is a template containing several plugins and themes. You can install a set on a specific WordPress site with a single click. After you create and name your set, add plugins and themes to it
Sets_.index_13_: To add a plugin to this set, enter the plugin name in the search field, press Enter, select the desired plugin, and then click Add
Sets_.index_14_: Please select a theme or plugin to add
Sets_.index_17_: Select WordPress sites where you want to install the set
Sets_.index_19_: Default installation of the latest versions of integration pack plugins and themes
